alert.note: Alert for Des Moines; Lee (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 10:00PM CDT until May 06 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN HANCOCK...HENDERSON...SOUTHWESTERN WARREN... NORTHWESTERN MCDONOUGH...SOUTHEASTERN DES MOINES AND NORTHEASTERN LEE COUNTIES... At 1000 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Heapsville, or near Burlington, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Hopper and Lone Tree around 1010 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Gladstone, Terre Haute, Olena, Decorra, Stronghurst, Henderson County Fairgrounds, Biggsville, Raritan, Media and Smithshire. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
